DOC.criteria: Group A : Subjects normal renal function Group B : Patients end stage renal disease Group C : Patients mild renal impairment Group D : Patients moderate renal impairment Group E : Patients severe renal impairment History uncontrolled unstable cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , hematopoietic , psychiatric and/or neurological disease Hepatitis B C Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) Recent gastrointestinal disease
